A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a fun movie. My wife and I really enjoyed it. All of the actors did a great job. I should give it a 1/2 a star though. I rarely see \"plot holes\" in movies\, they have to be really bad. I saw most of them right off the bat. My faith in the Star Wars universe died in the last movie\, I had put all my faith in this movie to redeem the franchise. I don't plan to watch any more Star Wars movies until they are free\, I am done.
